content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
-- Connect to Built in Serverless SQL Pool
-- Connect to nyc_taxi_discovery Database

USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/part-00000-tid-6133789922049958496-2e489315-890a-4453-ae93-a104be9a6f06-106-1-c000.snappy.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

-- Reading Folder

SELECT
    TOP 100 * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

--Check DataType
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'
-------------------------------------------
-- Define Columns and DataTypes
-------------------------------------------
SELECT
    TOP 100 * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH(

    VendorID	int
    ,lpep_pickup_datetime	datetime2(7)
    ,lpep_dropoff_datetime	datetime2(7)
    ,store_and_fwd_flag	CHAR(1)
    ,RatecodeID	int
    ,PULocationID	int
    ,DOLocationID	int
    ,passenger_count	int
    ,trip_distance	float
    ,fare_amount	float
    ,extra	float
    ,mta_tax	float
    ,tip_amount	float
    ,tolls_amount	float
    ,ehail_fee	int
    ,improvement_surcharge	float
    ,total_amount	float
    ,payment_type	int
    ,trip_type	int
    ,congestion_surcharge	float
    ) AS [result]
-------------------------------------------
-- Read Specific Columns
-------------------------------------------
SELECT
    TOP 100 * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]    


-------------------------------------------
-- Wild Card Chanracters in the File Name
-------------------------------------------
SELECT
    COUNT(1) -- 447770
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]    

-------------------------------------------
-- All Parquet Files 
-------------------------------------------
SELECT
    COUNT(1) -- 2304517
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]    

-------------------------------------------
-- All Parquet Files in Year =2020
-------------------------------------------
SELECT
    COUNT(1) -- 1734051
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]    

-------------------------------------------
-- All Parquet Files in Year =2020 and Month = Any
-------------------------------------------
SELECT 
    COUNT(1) -- 1734051
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]    

-------------------------------------------
-- filename()
-------------------------------------------
SELECT 
    result.filename() as file_name
    ,COUNT(1) AS file_record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]   
    GROUP BY result.filename() 


-------------------------------------------
-- filepath() and All Files recursively
-------------------------------------------
SELECT 
    result.filename() as file_name
    ,result.filepath() as file_path
    ,COUNT(1) AS file_record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]   
    GROUP BY result.filepath(),result.filename() 

-------------------------------------------
-- filepath() filters
-------------------------------------------

SELECT 
    result.filename() as file_name
    ,result.filepath() as file_path
    ,result.filepath(1) as Year
    ,result.filepath(2) as Month
    ,COUNT(1) AS file_record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )WITH(    
     tip_amount	float    
    ,trip_type	int
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE  result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
    GROUP BY result.filepath(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2),result.filename()
